function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inability to optimize health care research in ongoing pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential lack of public and professional awareness of germicidal uv technology and its efficacy.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate training and certification of uv technicians.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of research on time-motion exposure to apply current uv exposure guidelines effectively.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient dosing due to ambiguous guidelines for uv fixture deployment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate air changes per minute in the upper room","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Far uv dosing not confined to the upper room","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Measles is a highly infectious respiratory virus believed to be predominantly airborne, increasing the risk of widespread transmission in built environments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited pathogen reductions through air disinfection measures, such as uv, result in less than 1 log of risk reduction, which may be insufficient for effective control of airborne pathogens.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The south african study demonstrated that achieving greater protection from airborne pathogens through air changes ach became increasingly challenging, with smaller increments in protection requiring significantly higher equivalent air changes.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation about the safety and efficacy of uv products","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective surface decontamination with uv devices","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and technical expertise for upper room germicidal uv implementation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of routine use of upper room germicidal uv in buildings where airborne infection is likely","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Underestimation of the necessity of air disinfection in a wider variety of public settings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Neglect of homes as priorities for air disinfection","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient mechanical ventilation systems leading to the spread of airborne infections","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate surface disinfection in unoccupied rooms","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited exposure time of microbes to upper room guv","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective air disinfection","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air changes per hour ach","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of recapture, drafts, and noise","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low percentage of outside air in hvac system","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of high-level air filtration","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on low ach in hvac systems","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequacy of hvac systems for infection control","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complexity of ventilation efficiency calculation","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability and maintenance of hvac systems in resource-limited settings, and neglect in resource-rich settings, can lead to ineffective room air disinfection.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations of natural ventilation due to building design, sub-optimal practice, closed windows, and variable wind direction and speed.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in rebreathed air fraction raf due to closing windows and using ductless air conditioning, leading to increased risk of airborne infection.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of mycobacterium tuberculosis in the built environment due to its stability in air and low infectious dose","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective focus on high-level air filtration in central hvac systems for covid-19 mitigation","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Blurred distinction between different pathways of respiratory infections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Less transmission by large droplets and surfaces, and more by the airborne route","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 and 2 deaths attributed primarily to airborne transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of germicidal ultraviolet guv air disinfection leading to unchecked viral spread in the built environment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty in understanding the transmission pathways of covid-19 leading to ineffective control measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential development of drug-resistant pathogens due to inadequate disinfection measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provocations of right-wing parties calling for a ’return to normality’ and stopping npis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overlooking the immediate health and well-being benefits of npis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sustained decline in the incidence of respiratory diseases, including influenza and measles, but rebounding of rhinoviruses in children after the reopening of schools","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Significant reduction in aris and other infectious diseases during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Harmful collateral effects on health from non-pharmaceutical interventions npis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Interrupted or delayed access to healthcare due to pandemic control measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreased hospital admissions for non-covid related diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative psycho-social effects of prolonged npis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relaxation of state restrictions leading to increased covid-19 infections","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Under-reporting of cases and difficulties in getting tested","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in estimated infection cases due to sensitivity analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited understanding of the transmission factor eta beta","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
